name: Storms
description:
If you're looking for a refreshing, innovative, and challenging ARPG, you've found it. With over 120 unique and game-changing skills, three classes, over 200 unique items, fortress creation, and randomized worlds, Storms was built from the ground-up on giving the player meaningful, interesting choices. Decide what gear to use, what skills to choose, and what to build as you try to survive the deadly weather and dangerous enemies.

FEATURES
- Temperature, humidity, light-level, and inclement weather all have effects on combat. Use the environment to your advantage.
- A vast, to-the-point skill tree in which all skills change the way you play.
- Randomly generated worlds.
- Craft waypoints, personal chests, and fortresses to protect yourself from inclement weather and enemies. Beware - enemies can break your constructions.
- Hire mercenaries and gear them up.
- Loot!

Can you survive in The Land of Storms?
